resources.string: An error has occurred while trying initialize the application
Learn about and interact with our platform
This client app is now connected to its matching Node.js cloud code on FeedHenry. Tap the button to request a response from the cloud.
Now check your stats page in the studio to check that this cloud call happened.
Let\'s grab your location and do something with it.
First go to the Data Browser menu in your cloud code in the Studio and enable it. Then enter your name here and tap the button to save your name in our cloud database.
Yay, Your data was saved in the cloud

You can easily integrate with all of your existing back-end systems using Cloud Plugins. Check out the App Studio to see how to connect to Databases, Messaging, Analytics, SaaS, eCommerce, Logging, Data Storage, Testing Tools and File Storage. A few examples including

In addition to all of our app install/usage analytics, you can also instrument your cloud code to see exactly how it\'s performing. Go to the stats section of the Studio and see if your device has been detected
